thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Margie W
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Margie W

author: Margie W
title: Margie W
text:
Natalia Spirina in the South American division of Gowayy assisted me as a travel agent in helping develop the perfect personalized vacation for my family of four to travel to Bolivia in the summer. She was very knowledgeable, friendly and responsive. She assisted with the air, unique hotels, tours and activities. She is the go too gal for travel to that part of the world. thanks, Natalia!
Margie Weidert at The Travel Shoppe
